name: Alarm for Cobra 11: The Autobahn Patrol
name_original: Alarm for Cobra 11: The Autobahn Patrol
description:
Alarm for Cobra 11: The Autobahn Patrol is a racing-arcade game developed by VCC Entertainment. It was originally released in 2003. It was published by THQ.
Alarm for Cobra 11: The Autobahn Patrol is available on PC.
